activities: Medpace, Inc. provides worldwide clinical research and development of pharmaceutical products.  During research and development, Medpace collects and processes data relating to study participants from study investigators.  This data is collected and transferred to the United States in order to fulfill its business responsibilities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed Data, Human Resources data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
